name: iii /refragmen[touch]-ing the past
description: This piece represents a cornucopia of concepts for me: it's about sexuality, consent, pleasure, pain, post-2017-spirituality, reclamation of experience, memory, surfing through the catalog of past moments, [re]appropriation (of even one's own art), the relationship between online and offline art +multi-neuro-glitch! This is a canvas print of a digital piece, painted with acrylic, then photographed & redigized, then remixed and refelt and resampled...
collection_description: SuperRare makes it easy to create, sell, and collect rare digital art. SuperRare's smart contract platform allows artists to release limited-edition digital artwork tracked on the blockchain, making the pieces rare, verified, and collectible. Filter the crypto art world's best selling works by artist name, creation type, and year of birth on OpenSea.
